Articles.Content: Is there a way to do tables in the new forum software? My signature is totally hosed, since the table formatting didn't transfer. I also don't see any way to paste custom HTML into messages or signatures, so I can't put my signature back the way it was.

Same here.

I already passionately HATE the WYSIWYG way of posting. I want to see raw the code again. Only then can you truly see what you're doing.

Same here, signature messed up...

Is it HTML or BBCode that doesn't work anymore ? (I'd think HTML because of tables, but I would like to make sure)
Yep, I had to redo my signature.  No table support.
It looks like the forum software should support the CK Editor. If Squad wants to, they could install the appropriate plugin and get a lot of the editor features back for formatting.

NecroBones. Looking at your signature you've got it figured out.

Care to share how you did it?

Something like this?

Apparently, IPS does support tables...  but the editor doesn't.  I reverse engineered from Necrobones sig, but all I did was copy the HTML <table>, hand-edit it, viewed it in the web browser, and copied that into the WYSIWYG editor.  Same thing if you create the sig in any other editor (other forum, github, whatever) that allows you to generate tables.

Guys...BBcode in editor still works in most cases. So far the only things I've seen that don't work with BBcode is tables. Pretty much everything else still works with BBcode. The only difference is once you post it it just turns into WYSIWYG. But for when you're typing, you can still use BBcode to your hearts content.
